title: The Lustful Demon is the King of Demons
description: "Women should only cry in bed." Be it the orthodox faction, the unorthodox faction, or a member of the imperial family, the lustful demon, Cheon Jiyong, fucked them all until he was killed during the Demonic Cult Extermination. However, 10 years after the incident, the lustful demon returns and vows to fuck every woman in the Murim!
author: Minwon
